title: (3560) Sátão - 111 Rua Conde Dom Henrique
description: Municipal market free P, illuminated without trees. EXCEPT Sunday 00:00…15:00, when outside fare happens. To spend the night. Near the small town center with bars, restaurants and shopping. A bit noisy week as school is next. Possible also to sleep in the Intermarché parking or large free P front of firemen (Bombeiros) and police (GNR).

name: Largo São Bernardo
title: (3560) Largo São Bernardo
description: Large free P very near small town center, surrounded by firemen (= Bombeiros), police (GNR) and church. Slightly sloping, illuminated, without trees. Traditional shopping nearby.

name: Avelal, santuário Senhor da Agonia
title: (3560) Avelal, santuário Senhor da Agonia
description: Free leveled parking in small sanctuary “Senhor da Agonia” on top of soft hill (round panorama from white&black top pin). Places with shadows and without. Several picnic tables and grill points. 1 km away from Avelal small village. Hike “Rota do Barrocal” (see photo).

title: (3650) - Unnamed Road
description: Minas de querigas old tin mine with cave filled with water beautiful photos to do when the sun sends its ray in the bottom of the mine. Counted 2 km of track from the road

title: (3550-185) Penalva do Castelo - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to park near the police and center

title: (3550) Penalva do Castelo - Rua Emídio Cardoso
title_short: (3550) Penalva do Castelo - Rua Emídio Cardoso
description: Authorized motorhomes (6) parking with full free service area (electricity for 3), in small town aside garden and toilets. Three leveled places just behind service point. Other three accessible to electricity are in considerable slope. Quiet enough for overnight. parking max 48h

name: Praia Fluvial de Trabulo
title: (3560) Praia Fluvial de Trabulo
description: Beach on Vouga river, with bar and facilities (closed out Summer). Larger P 300m away. Sanctuary N. Sr. dos Caminhos lies 1 km East.

title: (3560) Decermilo - Santuário N. Sr. dos Caminhos
title_short: (3560) Decermilo - Santuário N. Sr. dos Caminhos
description: Sanctuary “Nosso Senhor dos Caminhos” with several picnic tables with shadows and several parking.  Hike “Rota dos Míscaros” (mushrooms).

title: (3530) Mangualde -
description: Public Water spring of the village's people.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Lots of places to land. Some tracks are abandoned and require a real franchisor.

title: (3530-107) Mangualde - CM1360
description: Nice place at a river - feels like a lake. We placed our camper at a dead-end dirt road going off the main road. Very quiet and wonderful view.

name: Parque de campismo "Quinta Chave Grande"
title: (3560) Parque de campismo "Quinta Chave Grande"
description: Authentic campsite in a green setting. very warm welcome. all amenities available. here we speak french.super meetings with the rare villagers met. change of scenery and serenity guaranteed. the detour is worth it. take the time to stay there.

title: (3650) - Variante à N329
description: Abandoned gas station, but parking for lunch break, because no rest area for more than 100 kms. No service

title: () Sátão - N323
description: Large free parking of the botanical park, no service, a paradise for electro-sensitive, no 3G signal, far from everything, very quiet.

title: (3515) Calde - Unnamed Road
description: Nature corner near a dam, a few swimmers during the day, quiet at night. Access by a paved road.

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - N323
description: Beautiful place for Pic nic with trees and tables near from river

title: (3650-020) Fráguas - 30 Rua Ponte Velha
description: Nice place right next to the river beach, beautiful view of the village, very quiet at night with toilet bins and drinking water tap. We stayed there for 3 days and 3 nights without any problems.

title: (3530) Mangualde - 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: Parking lot of the church “Nossa Senhora do Castelo” which lies on top of hill; shaded, quiet and peaceful… and extended panorama.

address.street: 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

title: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: P back of the church“Nossa Senhora do Castelo”, on top of high hill. There are 2 picnic tables and much more a little lower. You can walk a lower road around the church with beautiful views over valley, Mangualde city, and several mountains (including Serra da Estrela). Located below is a large children's playground, a bar / restaurant and other parking facilities.

address.street: 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

title: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: Parking spaces opposite children's playground and picnic tables.

address.street: 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

name: ASA Mangualde
title: (3530) ASA Mangualde
description:
We stayed one night at the above location and all ASA signage is still in place. Even in the village we find signposts that lead us there.
We used the free electricity and carried out gray water disposal.

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - 1 Largo Carvalhal
title_short: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - 1 Largo Carvalhal
description: Place in the center of a very nice small town, several cafe-restaurant really cheap. Tranquil the day as well as the night. Avoid Friday evening, every other week there is the market.

title: (3530) Mangualde -
description:
Parking lot of a disused soccer field. Flat, calm, relatively clean and possibility of shade.
No services. Access by dirt road in rather poor condition, but passable for van and van.
not perfect but excellent troubleshooting because few spots in the area.

title: (3505-390) Viseu -
description:
Helped us switch our Swedish gas bottle for a Portuguese one, complete with adapter to fit our car. Very helpful and friendly staff. 
Muito obrigado!

title: (3570) Coja - N229
description: Macadam path leaving the national road to rush into the forest on the edge. Several pitches, very little sloping but above all very quiet, not or little traffic.

title: (3505) Viseu -
description: Intermarché Service Area

title: (3640) Segões - M581-1
description: Parking lot of the nice river beach. after the main parkings on the road, there is a flat esplanade on dirt. swimming is also possible, cafe and toilets from the bar.

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - N329
description: Very shaded, stone benches and tables. Certainly possible for a night.

title: (3650) Coelheira - Unnamed Road
description: Very beautiful site in the middle of nature ideal for a night of stage. Much nicer than the car parks nearby, we came across this site by chance. We regret that we did not find it too late because we would gladly have spent the night. A fountain of spring water on site. Beware of fire, be particularly careful! a little further, the forest already burned. Respect this place as much on the cleanliness as on the risk of fire.

title: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
title_short: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
description: Very quiet place with camping table and trees. And there is a water point

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Lots of parking close to the sport area. quiet. close to the forest too and to the hostel. maybe they allow you to shower?

title: (3515) Viseu - Estrada São Gens
description: Parking area for departure walk, stone picnic table, quiet for the night (a little dirty area nevertheless)

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Municipal swimming pool shower, ask at the reception

title: (3500) Viseu - 110 Rua Arrabalde
description: Huge parking near the old town very quiet.

title: (3500-048) Viseu - 144 Rua Arco
description: Huge car park, Monday and Wednesday but market day

title: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
title_short: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
description:
Ample parking on the outskirts of viseu.
Flat and with a supermarket, Burger King and Leroy Merlin next door.
Quiet and without services, but the motorhome area 1 km away

title: (3515-114) Viseu - 39 Avenida Aquilino Ribeiro
description: Clean and Airy Laundry outside of Viseu.  Free WIFI too. Parking ample parking on road. Open 7 days a week

title: () Viseu - Avenida Emídio Navarro
description: Ample parking

title: (3510- 073) Viseu - Avenida Capitao Homem Ribeiro 199
description: 8 places on tarmac. Waste bins, gray water drain, free water with tap, two bins with tap, toilet door. FON Wi-Fi point nearby. Not far downtown and funicular.

title: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
title_short: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
description: In the absence of places in the nearby ASA, there is this place where you can go to night.

title: () Viseu - Rua Fonte
description: Parking on paved street, very quiet, next to a nice natural park. No service, ideal for one night.

title: (3500-401) Viseu - 244 Rua dos Almeida Furtado
description: Lavaplus - Laundry Self Service. Opens 7am and closes 12am

title: (3500-046) Viseu - 276 Rua Cruzeiro
description:
It's a nice place to park or sleep.
It's side by a shopping Palacio de Gelo.
Can go to a shopping walk.
Large space to park motorhomes or sleep.
Not have amenities but in mall you have food, wc and wifi.

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - EM594
description:
Free toilets, outdoor showers, childplay area,
nice river walk.

I'm here in March and its closed, maybe due to Coronavirus.

the parking nearby is for cars only.

title: (3570-043) Aguiar da Beira - 2 Rua Costeira
description: Small free P on old castle ruins hill (802m) near historic center and tourist office, little un leveled. Nice sunset from the P, and sunrise just opposite castle ruins slope. Street round this hill, with extended panorama day and night to E and S. Quiet overnight (illuminated); if windy, move to the other P suggestion.

title: (3510) Viseu -
description: Laundromat. Excellent service Portuguese, French and English spoken. Very clean. Self service. Cheap. Beside a cafe. Easy to park

title: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
title_short: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
description: Prince Perfeito Sports Center parking lot

title: (3570) Aguiar da Beira - 11 Avenida da Liberdade
title_short: (3570) Aguiar da Beira - 11 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Public free P behind Câmara Municipal (= townhall), maybe busy on working hours, a little un leveled at bottom (no painted spaces), illuminated by night, quiet enough to overnight. Near traditional shops. Monuments and tourist office accessible easily by foot.

title: (3530) Abrunhosa-a-Velha - Unnamed Road
description: Parking by the river accessible by small asphalt road but narrow (40.570933, -7.649091)

title: (3510) Viseu - Estrada Florestal de Mozelos
description: There's not one specific spot, it's a nice forest where we believe you could park anywhere, it's full off spots, some of them would require a good ground clearance such as 4×4 vehicle, but some  spots are reachable with a simple CC

title: (3520) Santar -
description:
Really clean (keep it that way!) and quiet place to stop for a break or spend the night at the square near a chapel at the end of a small village. 
Shaded by trees and not much traffic.

title: (3640) Quintela - Lapa
description: Lapa, Sernancelhe - Large parking area close to the Santuário de Nossa Senhora da Lapa. A nice place to be visited.

title: (3640) - 2 Avenida Padre Francisco Pinto Ferreira (EM584)
description: Peacefully parking to spend the night. so peaceful

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - A25
description: Fuel Station with free water in pump number #6, has a little of everything: playground, picnic tables, recycling garbage, electric car charge, ATM restaurant and Wi-Fi. Time limit to park and sleep 72 hours.

title: (6290) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice fishing place, no neighbors, secluded, the road to this place is narrow and bumpy, the end bit, is steep, probably recommend a four wheel drive, I made it with a front wheel drive, but had my doubts, when you first start, it's no point of return

title: (6290-251) - 2 Avenida da Liberdade
description: At the river with a small bathing beach and WC

title: (3600) Mamouros - CM1154
description: Small parking next to the pleasant pool, sloping

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 196 Rua Balneário Termal
description: Near to N2 rout, public swimming pool from July to September, spa in “Termas do Carvalhal”. Mini market.

title: (6370) - Ponte de Juncais, N 330 km 30,1.
(6370) - 7 N16
description: Along the river. Very large parking, even heavy goods vehicles can pausing. Peaceful place. Very good for so bathed!

title: (6370) Fornos de Algodres - 7 N16
description: Beautiful place located just right riverside of Mondego at picnic areas. Camper length up to 10 m (may be difficult to reverse). Swimming possible (surveillance on Summer). Beautifully situated on a river. Toilets and bar available in Summer.

title: (3520) Santar - N231
description: Parking along N231 across the road from a restaurant.  We parked here for the night alongside 2 oil tankers, great as there are no other Parking in the region.  The restaurant offers good and reasonably priced food. It was quite an unforgettable Portuguese night experience with Jorge, the restaurant patron.  Great to spend the night.  River few steps away, road is quite busy but it gets calmer at night.

title: (6370) Ponte de Juncais - N330
description: Beautiful idyllic meadow high above the river. Gravel path leads off from river beach nearby. Is feasible for smaller WoMos (5-6m). When there is a lot of rain, the river can flood and flood the path.

title: (3660) Pindelo dos Milagres - Unnamed Road
description: Possibility to park several vans, possibility to sleep, there can be evenings so not necessarily calm all the time, small beach for swimming and sunbathing, leave the road to take a clean dirt road not chaotic a motorhome does not pass , drive for 10min on the way to reach the place leave the place clean !

title: (3515) Ribafeita - Rua Igreja
description: Ribafeita, Viseu, Portugal. Large parking space without facilities, just outside the village on the edge of the forest. Igrea Matriz, church and cemetery.

title: (6370) Sobral Pichorro -
description: We only stopped for and ate something but this is a nice place for a night. Can be windy. Good internet/ 4G connection.

title: (3570) Pena Verde -
description: Beautiful view, tarmac road, super quiet place.

title: (3600) Castro Daire -
description:
Idyllic place by the river for swimming and barbecuing. Free of charge. Toilets available but were closed (May 2023). No waste containers installed at the moment. Quiet night, but well attended when the weather is bathing.
Enjoy nature!

title: (6370) - Unnamed Road
description: Land next to the sanctuary. Different locations under trees pay attention to the height of the vehicles because of the low branches. Highest ride at Castro de Santiago with space available. No service.

title: (6290) Nabais -
description: Small quiet corner at the edge of a very small road in the countryside between pine trees and rocks. We only had a picnic but there is a way to spend the night in peace. Room for 2 vehicles.

name: Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES
title: (6290) Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES
description: Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES. We are in a motorhome with 2 children 3 and 6 years old. Very friendly welcome by the boss who speaks French. We are parked under the trees, very relaxing. A playground for children. About 20 euros (pool extra, but very pretty). The restaurant is also very welcoming and the staff very friendly: meal for 4 for 30 euros, wine and coffee included! A very friendly English night watchman, and telling us that he stays awake all night for surveillance. We recommend !

title: (3520) Nelas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking stadium pequenos, day and night road, to Mangualde college, next to lntermarche and pingo doce

title: (3520-056) Nelas -
description: Intermarché parking park can stay overnight

title: (3520-061) Nelas - 20 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Laundromat with wifi and toilet

title: (3520-053) Nelas - 4 Rua do Peso
description:
Parking for autocaravans with filling and disposal.
New and clean.

title: (6290) São Paio - Unnamed Road
description: Place found by chance, a few meters from the N17. Superb unobstructed view of the Portuguese countryside in this month of February, mimosas in bloom and these round granite rocks Several other car parks along this road Saw nobody. Perfect place to stop overnight and leave the next day

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 1879 N228
description: Drinking water fountain well suited for filling water canisters. Large parking space.

title: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Easy parking above a sports field, with beautiful views and no lighting. Located in a quiet residential area, uncrowded at night, little traffic in the morning, some dogs barking at night. Not the most charming place, but good enough for one night.

title: (6290) São Paio - N17
description: For a picnic or more maybe.

title: (6290-261) - 21 Rua Nova
description:
Big Parking in village Rio Torto, it's free, it's not maintained at this time of year, maybe becus of the Covid19, cafe ( small shop)  around the corner, free toilets in front on church.
this very quiet and beautiful village.
it's alright to spend a night, durning the church is ringing every 30min.

title: (3600) Pepim - N288
description: Old road overlooking a football field. a bit off the current road. In the middle of nature but without any particular charm. Helps out well for one night.

title: (3600-136) Castro Daire - 89 Avenida António Serrado
description: Just off an n2 roundabout, 10 minutes walk into the town. Car park shaded by trees. There are picnic benches to sit at.  Day parking only.  we have a 7m motor home, and as car park, was pretty empty could manoeuvre without a problem.  if car park is busy, then probably more suited to a smaller camper van.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - N228
description: Small dirt parking off the road. Surrounded by Eucalyptus trees. We just stopped to got for a walk, but for one night, it could be a nice, quiet spot.

title: (6290) Gouveia - N17
description: A slightly different supermarket that also sells a lot of gas items for camping. Gas bottles from Campingaz can be exchanged here.

title: (6360-103) Mesquitela - 12 Rua da Ponte
description: Very quiet place, with plenty of drinking water

title: (6290) São Paio - N17
description: Gas station with long water hose pipe for filling up.

title: (3660) - N228
description: Small picnic or sleeping area, with barbecue and water. Near soccer fields and games for children. Very basic but little help if you are around. Nearby road.

title: (6290) São Paio - N17
description: Big  parking in front  of restaurant

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 6 Rua Cabine
description: Parking

title: (3640) Sernancelhe -
description: Place on top of a hill, with good views. Very quiet, the wind turbine makes a continuous noise, inside the vehicle it is not heard. Road suitable for all vehicles.

title: () - M 583 road
description: Nice natural platform at 630m high just on banks of Távora river, that here has small dam and a small old stone bridge. In Winter and Spring, on the grass. Very calm night accompanied by the singing of frogs. No services.

name: Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
title: (3640) Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
title_short: (3640) Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
description: Picnic space in the middle of nature on top of the hill, flat to overnight, crowned by chapel Nossa Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz (875m). Good access besides slope; spaces under and out trees. Extended landscapes mainly towards NW (Sernancelhe small town and Vilar dam). Tranquility and peace. Advise about not remain longer than 12 h. Hike “Rota da Castanha e do Castanheiro”.

title: (6290) São Paio - Quinta Da Pedra Alta
title_short: (6290) São Paio - Quinta Da Pedra Alta
description:
We only accept caravans for volunteering .

At the foot of the highest mountain range in Continental Portugal, Serra da Estrela, lays the old and beautiful house built on top of one of the hundreds of giant stones in the central area of ​​Portugal (hence the name of the estate "The Place of the High Stone").

For more than a century, it has been meticulously and tastefully built as a place of relaxation and family reunions and has remained to this day the ideal hiding place for intimate moments in the family.

One of our objectives is to allow nature to thrive, to take a regenerative and organic approach to agriculture, applying Permaculture principles and designs, to interfere as little as possible with the environment, to go about it all in an organic way - one that is not harmful to nature.

We are looking to receive caravans for short/medium/long-term volunteers, but we prefer medium/long term, to help us with all the Permaculture implementation, from the veggie garden, making slow and fast hot compost, human manure, planting trees, building dry toilets, fencing, take care of the horses, chickens, cleaning the terrain, the stables, the wood for fire and wood for several uses, the cut of the dead trees, etc etc etc

title: (3620) Leomil -
description: Close to the road with very little traffic, behind the pines. easy access by a path. very rustic but it helps.

title: (6360) Celorico da Beira - Rua do Paco
title_short: (6360) Celorico da Beira - Rua do Paco
description: Picnic (= Parque de merendas) 50m away from N 16 road, on Vila Boa do Mondego village, with 5 tables+seats, grill and fresh water (tap with no thread 10m away from street).

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
title_short: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
description: Park day/night near the church

title: (3640) Sernancelhe - R. Colégio
description: Public free illuminated P, aside N 229 road and building “Exposalão - Pavilhão multiusos” as well as bus station. Supposed to be quiet to overnight because traffic remains reduced. Leveled places at bottom.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 7 Largo Igreja
description: Public toilets, church and cleaning water on a fountain to drink. Trilho da Lombeira passes here

title: (3640-219) Sernancelhe - 18 Largo Município
description: Square with old town hall on the middle, and other parking spaces on streets around, just in middle of this very old small city (XII century) still with several original granite buildings and pilori. Police (GNR) office very near. Also near long stairs to climb top of castle ruin hill. Maybe busy on working hours. NOTE about vehicle dimensions: difficult to > 2,5m and 7m long.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 16 Rua Raposeira
description:
For filling clean water only.
Public place.

title: (3620) Viseu - 7 Rua Barreira de Vide
description: Parking at the church in Vila de rua only stopped for lunch but no restrictions lovely flat large car park and well lit

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 12 Marginal Távora
description: Free in line P along Marginal do Távora lane just aside Távora river left side, parallel to N 226 that follows at higher level. Alternative to P nearer beach on beginning of dam. Hike “Passadiço do Távora” starts 600m away.

title: (3640-211) Sernancelhe - 37 Avenida Tílias
description: Small public free P aside sport ground, very near main and long Tílias Avenue, and firemen (= Bombeiros). Not compatible for motorhomes longer than camper vans (for longer vehicles, see another P in this small town).

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 307 Rua Direita
description: Small parking lot where I often see campers.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - N16
description: Nice rest area with beautiful views, good for lunch or just to stop for break.

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 307 Rua Direita
description: Flat riverside free P (on line parking not painted, followed by transversal marked spaces), just aside riverside with beach (beginning of Vilar dam). Bar, picnic tables and children's games nearby, as well as restaurant. Pleasant surroundings (extended panorama from hill of Senhora das Necessidades chapel, 2 km away accessible to vehicles beside hard climbing up); walking path “Passadiço do Távora”.

title: (3640) Sernancelhe - 18 Bairro do Sul Minheiro
description: Washing machine, service station, car wash and vacuum cleaner. Nearby there is a food shop, a bakery and a children's park.

title: (3510) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to a chapel from 1678 and renovated in 2006, a square, BBQ building and children's playhouse. On a hill so it can be windy but enough space to find a sheltered spot. At 100m from a 4/5G mast

title: (6290) Gouveia - Travessa dos Barreiros
description: Laundromat in the intermarché car park

title: (3600-102) Castro Daire - 24 Rua da Portela
description:
Picnic area with a bombastic view, drinking water and the possibility to stand overnight.
Located on a 10km circular hiking trail. (information board at the church in the village)

Access rather nothing for huge ships.

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte -
description: Newly created parking lot, little un leveled and gravel soil. Only for self-sufficient vehicles! Wonderful new 3 km long walking trail (“Passadiço do Távora”) on wood along the shore of Vilar dam. Modern pedestrian bridge! 2 small restaurants in the village and bridge to N 226 road. Don’t miss visit ver old small city SERNANCELHE, 4 km away.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
description: Quiet carpark close to Lidl and park with playground and skate park. the park seems to host a market (don't know which days). no specific cat park spaces for campervans

name: Camping Quinta das Cegonhas
title: (6290-122) Camping Quinta das Cegonhas
description: Quinta das Cegonhas Rural Park

title: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
title_short: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
description: Big parking with lots of space. restaurant nearby, recreation area, walks, bicycle track and toilets.

title: (6290-525) Gouveia - 44 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Area next to public parking, built by the municipality in 2018. Very clean, flat and quiet place just over bus station, with extended panorama towards W (nice to watch sunset). Discharge of grey waters is 50 m down (before enter motorhome parking).

title: (3640-120) Freixinho - Unnamed Road
description: Leisure stone paved lane with trees along Vilar dam aside Freixinho village. Illuminated at night. Very peaceful besides near village. Take care with GPS access; follow “Zona de lazer” panel on main road/street.

title: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
title_short: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
description: Drinking water fountain. You have to be patient because the flow is low but the water is fresh and I think untreated. There is no indication of control or not but a local confirmed to me that it was drinkable and there is a sign in Portuguese which also suggests that it is drinkable (something like "provision by the town hall ")

title: (3460) - Rua Linha
description: Dão greenway car park 15 km south-west of Viseu. Former station of Parada de Gonta in a cul-de-sac. Café closed in 2018 from 15/8 to 4/9. 2 empty houses this August 23. Flat parking on bitumen. We can hear the road a bit (IP 3). Interesting for cyclists. Popular restaurant at Farminhāo train station, 3 km towards Viseu. Tap in front of this restaurant (5 km by road).

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park next to the river beach of pouves with some picnic tables and a small animal-friendly beach. Very narrow road not recommended for caravans only for vans. I spent a night there to sleep, very quiet, only dogs barking in the houses in the neighborhood

title: (3620) Faia - Caminho Sr. da Aflição
description: Super pleasant and really very quiet corner not far from the dam lake, provide drinking water and something to eat because the shops are far away, possibility of spending several nights.

title: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
title_short: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
description: Has a laundry self-Service, and supermarket, has a little place for breakfast and free bathrooms.

title: (3660-510) São Pedro do Sul - 96 Rua São Vicente de Paula

title: (3670) Vouzela - N228

title: (3620) Faia - 2 Travessa Barragem
description: Beautiful parking in Faia by the river. Easy access, there are some picnic tables and a barbecue area for public use. The swimming area is really nice, would recommend.

title: (3610) - Avenida António Teixeira
description: Pleasant parking for picnics. Tables and fountain. good views and shadow

title: (6290-071) - 165 Rua da Fonte

name: Camping Quinta Vale Do Mondego
title: (3525-201) Camping Quinta Vale Do Mondego
description: A small campsite in the making, no facilities yet, but plenty of space to stay with the camper.

title: (3620-339) Moimenta da Beira - 29 Rua Farol

name: Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
title: (6290-528) Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
title_short: (6290-528) Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
description:
Campsite Curral do Negro is pearl situated In Natural Parc Serra da Estrela.
It has very spacious and rustic camper, tent and caravan pitches quietly located on the top of the mountain (alt. 975 m.) including new glamping facilities. It has a stunning sunset and a view on the valley and it’s village Gouveia. (Which is only 3 kilometers (30 min walk) away from the campsite)

The owners Leonel & Liliana are a very hospitable and enthusiastic Portuguese couple. They give you a warm welcome and make sure you have a great stay here at the camp. They even can prepare you a very good Bacalhau on a wood fired BBQ. If you want them to cook for you then ask them in advance.
There is also a fresh bread service for the morning.  
In the campsite bar you can order drinks and some snacks and make use of the WiFi. Excellent sanitary facilities and hot showers. BBQ facilities, shade places. 
It has a swimming pool of natural water, with water from the mountain.
Directly from this campsite you can make beautiful hikes of several distances. Highly recommended! 

Here people speak Portuguese, English and Spanish.

IMPORTANT NOTE!
It’s very easy to get to the the campsite via a tarmac road, BUT 
Google maps will sent you by default on a narrow road.
Therefor follow this instruction.
FIRST navigate to “PSP - Esquadra de Gouveia” 
(address: Av. Gen. Humberto Delgado 40, 6290-530 Gouveia)
See link: 
And from there you follow the Camping signs “Curral do Negro”

Telephone:

title: (6360) Celorico da Beira -
description:
Campervan spot on a 28 hectare farm with stunning views over the Serra da Estrela. Eco toilet and outdoor solar (hot) shower available.

To reach our farm, follow the M553 from Celorico da Beira to Vide-entre-Vinhas and then continue the same road to Galisteu. Only at this point you can trust your GPS and make your descent to our farm via the last kilometer of dirtroad.

title: (6360) Celorico da Beira - 47 Avenida Doutor Marques Fernandes
title_short: (6360) Celorico da Beira - 47 Avenida Doutor Marques Fernandes
description: Picnic area (5 wooden tables with seats) just along N 16 road at beginning of Celorico da Beira small town (called capital of Serra cheese), with fresh water and shadows.

title: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
title_short: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
description: Convenient service area and parking near the thermal baths, but not used as a swimming pool, but mostly medical. All free and very quiet. Not suitable for motorhomes longer than 6m. Visiting the village and hot spring is a real pleasure. There is an outdoor pool on site, 10 minutes walk.

title: (3640-180) Sarzeda - M582
description: Sarzeda village of Sernancelhe county, district of Viseu. Water fountain without thread (requiring hose about 3cm diameter). 500m away from N229 road.

title: (3640-180) Sarzeda - 32 Rua Cieiro
description: Sarzeda village of Sernancelhe county, district of Viseu: water fountain on roundpoint of N 229 road. It has not thread, so requires hose about 3 cm diameter.

title: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
title_short: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
description: Nice Park out of high season (summer). Not caravan permitted but nobody is there in Autumn and Winter. We were alone!

title_short: (6360-302) Celorico da Beira - 23 Praceta Antero da Silva Pereira
description: Modern clean laundromat, ample parking in front of the salon. Monday to Sunday from 08:00 to 23:00.  Large table to sort laundry. laundry baskets. Laundry was very clean, many better machines than Intermarche.

title: (3660) Figueiredo de Alva -

title_short: (6360-348) Celorico da Beira - 1 Rua da Corredoura

This is a remote village that welcomes life. 
• Observe and feed the farm animals(sheep, goats, pig, rabbits, chickens, fishes)
• Picking a variety of fruits directly from the trees 
• Tasty products from the farm

title: (6360-067) - 15 Bairro Senhora Dom Embaixatriz Nosolin

title_short: (6360) Celorico da Beira - 34 Rua Maximiano António da Costa

title: (6290) Linhares da Beira -
description: Linhares da Beira Castle Square. Approximately 7 places for cars and vans right in front of the castle. The climb that does not pass through the town is very steep and narrow. There is a small shady park with benches right next door, and also WC in the village. Access to the 12th century castle is free. The town is very small and quiet.

title: (6360) - Rua Brandão de Melo
description: Simple parking to visit the medieval village on rocks and its castle. Very quiet in the middle of the day, so for one night. ...

title: (6290) São Paio - Unnamed Road
description: Drinking water

title: (3620) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful beach along the lake with a dam. No service but absolute tranquility.

title: (3640) Fonte Arcada -
description:
Initially, we went to look at the spot opposite on P4N but on the other side, it was impossible to get near the water with our camper van. So we walked around the lake and found a trail that led directly to the water's edge. A bit of a bumpy track but it's easy to navigate with our 6.50m camper van. Access by a track to the north east of the lake.
Several possible spots. Absolute tranquility, magnificent landscape, swimming possible.

title: (3640) Fonte Arcada - Miradouro da Senhora da Saúde
title_short: (3640) Fonte Arcada - Miradouro da Senhora da Saúde
description: Great spot at flat hill of “Miradouro de Nossa Senhora da Saúde”, with amazing views towards W across the Albufeira de Vilar (dam) and the hills beyond, as well as Fonte Arcada village just below; also nice sunset. Very quiet to overnight.

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 5 Porto Salto
description: Free public P in front of school (Escola Secundária) of Vizela small town, leveled and illuminated, either with or without trees. It lies 1 km away from historic center and long stone bridge ex-train and at higher level than town. Very quiet out of school activity.

title: (6420-240) Trancoso - Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 3 Largo Feira
description: Relatively quiet P with good space for big motorhomes but with big trees. Good start point for a visit to this nice small town. It is mountain bike center (see photo) including long flat bicycle track (Ecovia do Vouga) along previous train line that follows Vouga river deep valley, that has here very long stone bridge nearly over historic center as well as old steam locomotive on eastern top. As fare area is just opposite side of road (Largo da Feira), it may be busy on previous hours and along (once a month).

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Unnamed Road

title: (6290) Folgosinho - Caminho Natural
description: Parking next to the road. Space for three or four cars. Beautiful view of the valley and picknick tables and fresh mountain water available. Stayed here for the night without problems, barely any cars pass by.

title: (3640) - EM505

title: (6290) - N232

title: () - Unnamed Road
description:
Spacious flat place, good for visiting the magical village of Drave, walk 3.5 km until you get there. Easy route to the village and quite difficult on the return, since it is always uphill. There are about 300m of unpaved road to the place of overnight stay, it is not advisable to pass this place with the motorhome dirt road with parts with many deep holes.
Good trails.

title: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
title_short: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
description:
Oficial place for motorhomes without services. 
Prohibited on wednesday because of street Market.

address.street: Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata

title: (6270) Seia - 9 Avenida Doutor Sebastião Costa
description: Great free parking with superb views

title: (6270) Seia - 4-16 Rua de Santana
description: Parking of the bread museum (pão?). Many places, no service, slightly sloping, very quiet, free, there is another car park just below. It's pretty and lined with a small wood. !!WARNING!! Access can be complicated because the road is very steep and some turns very tight !! We went in 1st and with good brakes with Citroën jumper well loaded ..

title: (6360-496) Lajeosa do Mondego - 25 Rua do Alto do Monte
title_short: (6360-496) Lajeosa do Mondego - 25 Rua do Alto do Monte
description: Public rest area in the village of Lageosa do Mondego together with the river beach ("praia fluvial") on the Mondego river, 100m from the N16 road. Nice, clean and quiet place in the center of the village. Free service area to empty your tanks and fill them with fresh water. Playground for children, cafes nearby. Tables and barbecues. Public bathroom and showers with free hot water open 24 hours a day and very clean.

title: (6360) Lajeosa do Mondego - Unnamed Road
description:
Land under construction, great space to park in peace and quiet in contact with nature, in the town of Aldeia Rica, 5 minutes from the A25 and IP2, it has a river beach 2 km away where you can swim, fish or simply enjoy a day of leisure, it has paths for hiking as well as a football field 5 to 500m. It is located 8 minutes from the historic village of Celorico da Beira, where there are several monuments and castles, close to the service area.
Quiet place to be in contact with nature and its animals. The land has a well with water and in the future wells will be created to discharge waste water from the caravans.
Unit price per vehicle for 5 euros daily.

title: (6270) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to the road a small parking area with breathtaking views. In October a very quiet place, hardly any traffic.

title: (4690) - Er 321
description: Portas do Montemuro, great place with a 360 degree view of the valleys. next door is a gas station. little traffic in the evening. the dog yells at the gas station at night. compensated the morning after

title: (3620) - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic tables and a beautiful viewpoint near the Santuário de São Torcato. We stayed there on a Sunday at 2pm no one was there. Shade under the pines, maybe possibility to spend the night there, we did not try.

title: (3460) Tondela - 130 Bairro Ponte
description: River Beach Parking.

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Compared to other areas close by, this layby offered us very good shelter from the wind. Pretty leveled, too.

title: (6420) Terrenho - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the lake, several possibilities of parking until the dam or the road stops. The access is excellent and practicable by all the templates. Here is the calm, softness and serenity guaranteed at the edge of the water and 500 meters from the small village of Terrenho. No service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (6270) Seia - Rua da Eira
description: Semi stabilized area, shaded, away from the road and overlooking the valley. The view is exceptional at 180 °. Picnic tables, no service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. A nice place for a cool bivouac! Be careful, however, to the possible nuisance caused by the kennel located at about fifty meters.
